sliderFirstText: We offer you advanced digital solutions with complete digital support!
sliderSecondText: Don't worry, we've done it many times, you'll be happy!
sliderThreeTitleFirst: Or do you want a brand new one
sliderThreeText: We will create software for you and adapt it to your needs!
aboutUsTitle: Digital solutions for the future and more efficient business!
aboutUsText: We accept challenges, aim for the essence and make things possible. Quality product, accessibility and meeting deadlines is something we strive for in our daily work.
aboutUsCardOneText: At the very beginning, we like to listen to the client's requests, but we also like to offer our suggestions so that the client gets the best.
aboutUsCardTwoText: We are dedicated to shaping business ideas into digital products and experiences that add new value to our customers and users.
aboutUsCardThreeText: In the creation of digital web platforms and applications, our experts will apply the technology that best suits your needs.
servicesTitle: We combine creativity, technology & design in our daily work
servicesText: See what services we offer below
servicesCardOneText: We strive to visually create a product that will be attractive and pleasant for users to use.
servicesCardTwoText: Creation of simple presentations on the Internet, but also large complex systems, using the most modern web technologies.
servicesCardThreeText: We all love to play a good video game? Want to make your own? We're here!
servicesCardFourText: Do you need 24/7 customer support? Don't want your customers to wait for an answer? Contact us!
servicesCardFiveText: Focus on the core of your business with lower operating costs. Complete IT support. Fully built infrastructure.
servicesCardSixText: Do you want an application that will always be with you? No problem. We can develop it using the most modern mobile technologies.
typeOfWorkTitle: We try to give the client the best and that's why we offer 3 models of work
typeOfWorkText: Each model includes an adequate assessment of optimal technologies for a specific project, an assessment of team structure and realistic, cost-effective project duration.
typeOfWorkCardOneText: Minor tweaks. Quick tweaks and improvements. Smaller projects for a maximum timeframe of 8 weeks.
typeOfWorkCardTwoText: Development of projects From the very beginning to the upgrade Planning and implementation with a team of experts
typeOfWorkCardThreeText: Constant support, maintenance and upgrades. Platform and project longer than 6 months. Assigning a team of developers with a project manager and coordinator.
principlesOfWorkTitle: We are fundamental in our work
principlesOfWorkText: We want to respect each step and take enough time for each.
principlesOfWorkCardOneText: At the very beginning, we need to get to know each other and understand your wishes and needs! We try to give you useful advice and suggestions to make your product better!
principlesOfWorkCardTwoText: After the introduction and basic agreement, we start creating the concept of the product itself. What should it basically look like and what should it contain!
principlesOfWorkCardThreeText: After adopting the basic concept, we start with product development. Depending on the size of the project, development is done in stages, and after each stage we do testing on our test machines.
principlesOfWorkCardFourText: After the completion of the development and testing phase, when the product is completely ready, we transfer it to the main production server and it becomes available for users.
clientsCardOneText: “I am the director of a kindergarten. I needed software for management and organization within the kindergarten. My expectations were exceeded. All recommendations!”
clientsCardTwoText: “I wanted to create a web application for networking all people in the world with the same last name. My idea has finally been implemented!”
clientsCardThreeText: “I needed a site to promote my fast food kiosk. After additional advertising of the site, my kiosk also started doing better.”
joinUsTitle: Let's move the digital industry forward together!
contactTitle: Chat or get to know us
